channel.title: Project Reality [PI] **Fully Featured RSPS** - Dialogue & Quests [FIRST]
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Welcome to my first and only Runescape private server, [b][i]Project Reality[/i][/b].
I've been working on this server for about 4 months now and I think I'm finished with RSPS's.
Sorry for the lack of information, I have a lot of pictures to show:[/size]
I'll first start out with the features:
VENGANCE [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/293zw9u.jpg[/img]
[i]Armadyl Godsword[/i] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2agsuf7.jpg[/img]
Barrelchest Anchor [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2a0e0ax.jpg[/img]
DDS [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1zgrmm9.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Now for the quests & dialogue..[/size]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zptbih.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/s3eqmw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/1zxp1xw.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/30lp17s.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/qwwx39.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2i06qyo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2mzflo6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2mobf9c.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2lsxhec.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/mshahk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2ykz2wy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/282ej5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/15j37p.jpg[/img]
Thank you for viewing my thread and thank you for repping me. (JK)
Credits: Me - 35% MSC - 40% Demise - 25%
Client: http://www.mediafire.com/?f2cy5ey7b3donxy
Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?zv5op71v2q5ysd3
Thanks! Lord Typhis
P.S - If you want more information and features please see this video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N4G2A2GqaFE&feature=channel_video_title
